description: The hash identifier of the pool.
name: pool_hash

description: The epoch where this pool retires.
name: retiring_epoch

description: The epoch number in which this pool retirement was announced.
name: epoch_no

description: The index of this pool retirement within the certificates of this transaction.
name: cert_index

description: The Tx table hash of the transaction where this pool retirement was announced.
name: announced_tx_hash

description: The slot number in which this pool retirement was announced.
name: slot_no

description: The Tx table index of the transaction where this pool retirement was announced.
name: announced_txidx
